## Description {#details}

This file defines the AMDGPUCustomBehaviour class which inherits from CustomBehaviour.

This class is used by the tool llvm-mca to enforce target specific behaviour that is not expressed well enough in the scheduling model for mca to enforce it automatically.

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/amdgpucustombehaviour"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/amdgpucustombehaviour/#a8c616a0039f36b38c197da02e179797b">AMDGPUCustomBehaviour</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour/#ad9c2ca3f16c7d9d1c6cd4a20269ba729">CustomBehaviour</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Whenever MCA would like to dispatch an s&#95;waitcnt instructions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we must check all the instruction that are still executing to see if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// they modify the same CNT as we need to wait for. This vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// gets built in the constructor and contains 1 WaitCntInfo struct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for each instruction within the SrcManager. Each element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tells us which CNTs that instruction may interact with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We conservatively assume some instructions interact with more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CNTs than they do in reality, so we will occasionally wait</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// longer than necessary, but we shouldn&#39;t ever wait for shorter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;WaitCntInfo&gt; InstrWaitCntInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method gets called from the constructor and is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// where we setup the InstrWaitCntInfo vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The core logic for determining which CNTs an instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// interacts with is taken from SIInsertWaitcnts::updateEventWaitcntAfter().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Unfortunately, some of the logic from that function is not available to us</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in this scope so we conservatively end up assuming that some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions interact with more CNTs than they do in reality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> generateWaitCntInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper function used in generateWaitCntInfo()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper function used in generateWaitCntInfo()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper function used in generateWaitCntInfo()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method gets called from checkCustomHazard when mca is attempting to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dispatch an s&#95;waitcnt instruction (or one of its variants). The method</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// looks at each of the instructions that are still executing in the pipeline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to determine if the waitcnt should force a wait.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> handleWaitCnt(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;InstRef&gt;</a> IssuedInst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Based on the type of s&#95;waitcnt instruction we are looking at, and what its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// operands are, this method will set the values for each of the cnt</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/amdgpucustombehaviour/#a690f1af5fe823121581fc0f21e8dd21c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/amdgpucustombehaviour/#a690f1af5fe823121581fc0f21e8dd21c">~AMDGPUCustomBehaviour</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method is used to determine if an instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should be allowed to be dispatched. The return value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// how many cycles until the instruction can be dispatched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method is called after MCA has already checked for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// register and hardware dependencies so this method should only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implement custom behaviour and dependencies that are not picked up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by MCA naturally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/amdgpucustombehaviour/#a17cb5a2e79bf568a343e0beb4176cbec">checkCustomHazard</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;InstRef&gt;</a> IssuedInst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace mca</span></CodeLine>
